verses.verse: Then we turned <S%H6437><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us <S%H5971><s%>, he and all his people, unto battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei <S%H154><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3372><s%>, Fear him not <S%H5414><s%>; for I have delivered him <S%H5971><s%>, and all his people, and his land <S%H776><s%>, into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; and thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> unto him as thou didst <S%H6213><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>.

So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hand <S%H3027><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> also <S%H4428><s%>, the king of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all his people <S%H5971><s%>: and we smote <S%H5221><s%> him until none was left <S%H7604><s%> to him remaining <S%H8300><s%>.

And we took <S%H3920><s%> all his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>; there was not a city <S%H7151><s%> which we took <S%H3947><s%> not from them <S%H8346><s%>; threescore cities <S%H5892><s%>, all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

All these were cities <S%H5892><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> with high <S%H1364><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%>, gates <S%H1817><s%>, and bars <S%H1280><s%>; besides the unwalled <S%H6521><s%> towns <S%H5892><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7235><s%>.

And we utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, as we did unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> every inhabited <S%H4962><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, with the women <S%H802><s%> and the little ones <S%H2945><s%>.
But all the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%>, we took for a prey unto ourselves <S%H962><s%>.

And we took <S%H3947><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> out <S%H3947><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, from the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>;
<S%H2768><s%>( which Hermon the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Sirion <S%H8303><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> it Senir <S%H8149><s%>;)

all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%>, and all Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, unto Salecah <S%H5548><s%> and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

(For only Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>; behold <S%H6210><s%>, his bedstead was a bedstead <S%H6210><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; is it not <S%H3808><s%> in Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>? nine <S%H8672><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H702><s%>, and four cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it <S%H520><s%>, after the cubit of a man <S%H376><s%>.)

And this land <S%H776><s%> we took in possession <S%H3423><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>: from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, which is by the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, gave I unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>:

and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%>, gave <S%H5414><s%> I unto the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, even all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>. (The same <S%H1931><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>.

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%>, unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maacathites <S%H4602><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> them <S%H1316><s%>, even Bashan, after his own name <S%H8034><s%>, Havvoth-jair <S%H3117><s%>, unto this day.)
And I gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> unto Machir <S%H4353><s%>.

And unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and unto the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> from Gilead <S%H1568><s%> even unto the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H5158><s%>, even unto the river Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> also <S%H3383><s%>, and the Jordan and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H3672><s%>, from Chinnereth even unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>, the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, under the slopes of Pisgah <S%H798><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5674><s%>: ye shall pass over armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, all the men <S%H1121><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>.

But your wives <S%H802><s%>, and your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, (I know <S%H3045><s%> that ye have much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>,) shall abide <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> which I have given you <S%H5414><s%>,

until Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> give rest <S%H5117><s%> unto your brethren <S%H251><s%>, as unto you <S%H3423><s%>, and they also possess the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> them beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: then shall ye return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his possession <S%H3425><s%>, which I have given you <S%H5414><s%>.

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto these two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>: so shall Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> whither thou goest over <S%H5674><s%>.
Ye shall not fear <S%H3372><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that fighteth for you <S%H3898><s%>.
And I besought <S%H2603><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

O Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, thou hast begun <S%H2490><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> thy greatness <S%H1433><s%>, and thy strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>: for what god <S%H410><s%> is there in heaven <S%H8064><s%> or in earth <S%H776><s%>, that can do <S%H6213><s%> according to thy works <S%H4639><s%>, and according to thy mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>?

Let me go over <S%H5674><s%>, I pray thee <S%H7200><s%>, and see the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that goodly <S%H2896><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H5674><s%> with me for your sakes <S%H8085><s%>, and hearkened not unto me <S%H3068><s%>; and Jehovah said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7227><s%>, Let it suffice thee <S%H1696><s%>; speak no more <S%H3254><s%> unto me of this matter <S%H1697><s%>.

Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> unto the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and northward <S%H6828><s%>, and southward <S%H8486><s%>, and eastward <S%H4217><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: for thou shalt not go over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

But charge <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and encourage <S%H2388><s%> him <S%H553><s%>, and strengthen him <S%H5674><s%>; for he shall go over before <S%H6440><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, and he shall cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%>.
So we abode <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Beth-peor <S%H1047><s%>.
